vlive.korean: 살 찝으시면며 안 되고 최대한 밀착해서 하시면 돼요. Don't pinch your eyelid. Get closer to your eyelid. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 룡이의 리얼검증! 초강력 waterproof makeup

vlive.korean: 정말 어쩜 이렇게 한심할까라며... - 근데 이런 모습을 더 좋아할 수도 있어요. "How pathetic". - They might like us more this way. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 동방신기 V앱 첫 방송! (TVXQ! 1st V LIVE)
vlive.english: "How pathetic". - They might like us more this way.

vlive.korean: 아까 300만 원짜리라며. - 저는 시간이라도 있을 줄 알았어요. You said that is worth 3 million won! - I thought it was going to tell time. 듣기 View video KNK : [마이 크나큰 텔레비전] #39 크나큰(KNK) 전자기기 없이 생활하기 Part.2
vlive.english: You said that is worth 3 million won! - I thought it was going to tell time.
